Description: Large three-bedroom apartment with Bonus Room/Office in Prime Everett location! Second-floor unit recently updated. Features hardwood floors throughout, a large eat-in kitchen, laundry room with washer/dryer hookups, newer windows and light fixtures. Huge back porch and a large backyard. Minutes from Everett City Hall, Glendale Square and Encore Casino. Easy highway access. Short drive to Downtown Boston. Great Location!
